title: Tory Lanez Interview and more
itunes:title: Tory Lanez Interview and more
description:
Monday 3/5- Today on the show we had Tory Lanez stop by where he spoke about the meaning of his album "Memories Don't Die", having his own sound and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to all the people that were upset with Kobe Bryant winning an award at the Oscars, which led us to open up the phone lines to see if our listeners thought it was okay to bring up Kobe's past allegations, despite his other successes. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 3/5- Today on the show we had Tory Lanez stop by where he spoke about the meaning of his album "Memories Don't Die", having his own sound and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to all the people that were upset with Kobe Bryant winning an award at the Oscars, which led us to open up the phone lines to see if our listeners thought it was okay to bring up Kobe's past allegations, despite his other successes. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
